titleStmt.title: The art of embalming dead saints, discovered in a sermon preached at the funerall of Master William Crompton, the late reverend and faithfull pastor of the church in Lanceston Cornwall. Ianuary the fifth, 1641. By G. Hughes. B.D. Pastor of the church in Tavistocke Devon.
titleStmt.author: Hughes, George, 1603-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.N. for John Rothwell, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Sun,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The embalming of dead saints.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Sun
